answer:
(i) ldentification of Specimens P and R:

  • Specimens P- Saw dust
  • R- Bird

(ii) Reasons why the use of specimen P (Saw dust) is not recommended in a brooder house:

  • It contaminates the feed
  • It contaminates the water
  • It may get into the eyes of the chicks and lead to blindness.
  • It may lead to breathing difficulty if
  • it enters the nostrils of chicks,
  • Chicks tend to feed on it and in the process may contact s disease.
  • Cakes up easily and loses the ability to h absorb droppings.
  • May accommodate sharp objects like nails which could harm the farmer animal.

(iii) Alternative material for Specimen P(Saw dust) in a brooder house:-

  • Rice Husk
  • Wood shavings
  • Ground maize cobs
  • Crushed dry Kenaf stems.
  • Dry grass.
  • Dried groundnut husks

(iv) Name given to the product formed when poultry dropping mix with Specimen P (Sawdust): - Farmyard manure/poultry manure.

(v) Uses of the product mentioned in a(iv) in agricultural production: -

  • To improve soil fertility.
  • To improve soil structure/binds soil particles together.
  • For compost making.
  • For fertilization of fish pond ruminants/part of the feed for ruminants
